label.en: Total Number of Pots in Water
label.es: Numero Total de trampas en el Agua

helptext.en: Enter the total number of pots in the water in all areas.
helptext.es: Introduzca el n√∫mero total de macetas en el agua en todas las areas.

total_traps_water_empty.en: No Total Number of Pots in Water provided.

total_traps_water_invalid.en: Invalid Total Number of Pots in Water provided.

label.en: Average Number of Pots Per String in Water

helptext.en: Enter the average number of pots per string in all areas.

avg_num_traps_empty.en: No Average Number of Pots Per String provided.

avg_number_traps_invalid.en: Invalid Average Number of Pots provided.

label.en: Number of Strings Hauled This Trip

helptext.en: Enter the number of strings that were hauled on this trip.

strings_hauled_format.en: Invalid Total Number of Strings Hauled provided.

strings_hauled_empty.en: No Total Number of Strings Hauled provided.

label.en: Average Soak time of Strings Hauled This Trip

helptext.en: Enter the average soak time of all the strings hauled on this trip.  Decimal values are acceptable.

avg_soak_time_min_format.en: Invalid Average Soak Time of all Strings Hauled provided. Only two decimals values allowed for this field.

avg_soak_time_format.en: Invalid Average Soak Time of all Strings Hauled provided.

avg_soak_time_empty.en: No Average Soak Time of all Strings Hauled provided.

label.en: Total Number of Buoy Lines in Water

helptext.en: Enter the total number of buoy lines in the water in all areas.

bouy_lines_empty.en: No Total Number of Buoy Lines provided.

buoy_lines_format.en: Invalid number of Buoy Lines provided.

date_land_before.en: Date land before minimum date allowed.

date_land_after.en: Date land after maximum date land.

label.en: Total Number of Pots in This Area

helptext.en: Enter the total number of pots in the water in this area.
helptext.es: Introduzca el numero total de macetas en el agua en esta area.

label.en: Number of Pots Hauled This Area

helptext.en: Enter the number of pots that were hauled in this area.

label.en: Average Number of Pots Per String Hauled This Area

helptext.en: Enter the average number of pots per string that were hauled in this area.

label.en: Total Number of Buoy Lines in This Area

helptext.en: Enter the total number of buoy lines in the water in this area.
